name: RainSound
0:
”Alexa, open rain sound”
”Alexa, play rain sound”
”help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain sound
Developer Terms of Use
des: One of the leading sleep and relaxation artists in the world offers you the Rain Sounds sleep aid. Thousands of people use the album "Rain Sound" to help them fall asleep and relax every night, and this really high-quality rain sound is taken straight from it. Rain's ability to induce tranquillity is now accessible on your Alexa device for the first time. Using a specially equalized recording of a real rain, Rain Sounds is precisely designed to assist you in falling asleep and staying asleep. USE GUIDE: Using Rain Sounds Say, "Alexa, play sounds of rain." Rain Sounds will begin to play automatically and continue until you tell it to stop, or till the end of the night. PLAY UNINTERRUPTED: High quality music and all-night play (five hours as opposed to one-hour loops) are features of Rain Sounds' premium service.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
